asianoption



alias default_integrand = ctintegrand!(0x1.e44a9a3081f8ca1ep-6, 0x1.5555555555555556p-2, 4, 40, 0.2, 35).ctintegrand;
risk-neutral rate = 3%/year maturity = 1/3 year = 4 month average = 4 times discrete monitoring (monthly) initial price = 0 voratility = 20% strike price = 35

double integrand(in double r, in double T, in int S, in double P0, in double sigma, in double K, in double[] x);
Asian option integrand: ordinary function version.

sum[1 <= i <= S] exp (ai+by[i]) = exp(a+by[1]) (1+exp(a+by[2]) (1+exp() ... ))

to calculate this efficiently we can write v <- exp(a+by[S]) foreach i in [1..S-1]: v <- v+1 v <- exp(a+by[i])

template ctintegrand(double r, double T, int S, double P0, double sigma, double K)
Asian option integrand: template version.

Remarks:
Not so fast though many constants are CTFEed.
